front.title: Numeric Locators for Uniform Resource Identifiers

abstract.t: This document describes the syntax of numeric character strings,called numeric locators or simply locators, which form a hierarchicalname space where any node except the root can (or, if it is a leafnode, must) resolve to a single Uniform Resource Identifier. It alsodefines a mapping of the locator name space to the Domain NameSystem, which allows the use of the existing DNS infrastructure toresolve locators.
